content:
Yes, there are many modern artists who have been influenced by the Commodores' music. Here are a few examples:

1. Anderson .Paak: This Grammy-winning singer/songwriter and multi-instrumentalist has been praised for his unique blend of R&B, funk, and hip-hop. He cites the Commodores as a major inspiration, and his music reflects their funky, groovy sound.

2. Bruno Mars: This pop superstar has been heavily influenced by the Commodores and other classic funk and soul artists. His hit track "Finesse" features a funky sound reminiscent of the Commodores' classic grooves.

3. Childish Gambino: This rapper, actor, and comedian has cited the Commodores as an influence on his music. His album "Awaken, My Love!" features a blend of funk, soul, and R&B, and includes tracks that evoke the Commodores' smooth ballads.

Overall, the Commodores' influence on modern music can be heard in a diverse range of artists and genres. Their timeless sound continues to inspire new generations of musicians and fans.
